subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Mark Recchi scored twice in the final minutes, and Tuukka Rask stopped 32 shots for the Boston Bruins, who opened a three-goal lead and held on to beat the Toronto Maple Leafs.
snippet: Mark Recchi scored twice in the final minutes, and Tuukka Rask stopped 32 shots for the Boston Bruins, who opened a three-goal lead and held on to beat the Toronto Maple Leafs.
